General.Name: Jack Sewing
General.Description: Jack Technology Co., Ltd engages in the research, develop, production, and sale sewing machines in China and internationally. The company offers range of sewing machines including overlock and interlock sewing machine, special machine, and roller car series products; cutting bed and cloth spreading machines, such as single-layer and multi-layer cutting bed products; and three-needle straight-arm chain stitch embedment machine, trousers hemming machine and automatic trousers loop machine, etc. It products are used in various industries, such as clothing, luggage, shoes, hats, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Jack Sewing Machine Co., Ltd. Jack Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Taizhou, China.

1.Name: Ms. Yun Jiao  Xie
1.Title: CFO & Sec. of the Board of Directors
